description: Internships vary in length but all take place within organisations or companies, are vetted and approved by the South Asian Studies Programme, have relevance to the major in South Asian Studies, involve the application of subject knowledge and theory in reflection upon the work, and are assessed. Available credited nternships will be advertised at the beginning of each semester. In exceptional cases, internships proposed by students may be approved by the department.
title: Extended South Asian Internship
